bhañjati：[〃bhañj] 破る，破壊す．aor bhañji; opt．bhañjeyya; fut．bhañjissaṃ; grd．bhañjitabba; pp．bhagga①．
Bhañjati，（bhañj + a），打破，破壞。 【過】 bhāñji。 【過分】 bhagga，bhañjita。【現分】 ~janta，~jamāna。 【獨】 ~jitvā。（p240）
Bhañjati，（bhañj崩潰+a），打破，破壞。【過】bhāñji。【過分】bhagga，bhañjita。【現分】bhañjanta，bhañjamāna。【獨】bhañjitvā。

bhañjati：bhañjati（kri）
ဘဉ္ဇတိ（ကြိ）
[bhanja+a+ti．dhātvattha．]
[ဘန္ဇ+အ+တိ။ ဓာတွတ္ထ။]

Bhañjati， [bhañj，cp．Vedic bhañjati & bhanakti，roots with & without r，as Lat．frango=Goth．brikan=Ohg．brehhan，E．break，Sk．giri-bhraj breaking forth from the mountain; and Sk．bhaṅga，bhañji wave．-- The Dhtp．68 paraphrases by “omaddana，＂ Dhtm 73 by “avamaddana＂] 1．（trs．& intrs．） to break Vin．I，74 （phāsukā bhañjitabbā ribs to be broken）; Dh．337 （mā bhañji=mā bhañjatu C．）．Pv．II，93 （sākhaṁ bhañjeyya =chindeyya PvA．114）; PvA．277 （akkho bhañji the axle broke，intrs．）．-- 2．to fold or furl （the lip）：oṭṭhaṁ bh．J．II，264．-- 3．（fig．） to break up，spoil，destroy，in atthaṁ bh．to destroy the good S．IV，347 （cp．bhañjanaka）．-- pp．bhagga1 （q．v．）．（Page 496）
BHAÑJATI：（bha ñj+a） làm bể，phá hoại [aor] bha ñji [pp] bhagga，bha ñjita [prp] --janta，jamāna [abs] bha ñjitvā

bhañjati：ဘဉ္ဇတိ（ကြိ）
[ဘန္ဇ+အ+တိ။ ဓာတွတ္ထ။]
ချိုဖဲ့-ဖျက်ဆီး-၏။

bhañjati：ဘဉ္ဇတိ （√ဘဉ္ဇ်）
ချိုးဖဲ့၏။ ချိုးဖြတ်၏။ ဖျက်ဆီး၏။
